citations.narrative:
There are at least 10 galvanized self-feeders which are very rusty. Food receptacles that are rusty can not be properly
cleaned and sanitized which could expose the rabbits to potential disease hazards. The rusty self-feeders must be
replaced or repaired so that the receptacles can be adequately cleaned and sanitized at least once every two weeks.
Correct by August 10, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.54(b) 
   
Feeding. 
There are at least 10 galvanized self-feeders which are very rusty. Food receptacles that are rusty can not be properly 
cleaned and sanitized which could expose the rabbits to potential disease hazards. The rusty self-feeders must be 
replaced or repaired so that the receptacles can be adequately cleaned and sanitized at least once every two weeks. 
Correct by August 10, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
